12 void ParticleFilter::predictTarget(uint robotNumber)
13 {
14  if (!initialized_)
15  return;
16 
17  state.targetPredicted = true;
18 
19  *iteration_oss << "predictTarget(OMNI" << robotNumber + 1 << ") -> ";
20 
21  // Update iteration time
22  if (state.allTargetMeasurementsDone())
23  {
24  iterationTime = ROS_TIME_SEC - prevTime;
25  prevTime = ROS_TIME_SEC;
26 
27  ROS_DEBUG("Iteration time: %f", iterationTime);
28  }
29 
30  using namespace boost::random;
31 
32  ROS_DEBUG("OMNI%d is predicting the target state.", robotNumber + 1);
33 
34  // Random acceleration model
35  normal_distribution<> targetAcceleration(TARGET_RAND_MEAN,
36  TARGET_RAND_STDDEV);
37 
38  for (int i = 0; i < nParticles_; i++)
39  {
40  // delta = v*dt + 0.5*a*dt^2 with a new random acceleration for each
41  // component
42 
43  particles_[O_TARGET + O_TX][i] +=
44  state.target.vx * iterationTime +
45  0.5 * targetAcceleration(seed_) * pow(iterationTime, 2);
46  particles_[O_TARGET + O_TY][i] +=
47  state.target.vy * iterationTime +
48  0.5 * targetAcceleration(seed_) * pow(iterationTime, 2);
49  particles_[O_TARGET + O_TZ][i] +=
50  state.target.vz * iterationTime +
51  0.5 * targetAcceleration(seed_) * pow(iterationTime, 2);
52  }
53 }
54 
55 void ParticleFilter::fuseRobots()
56 {
57  if (!initialized_)
58  return;
59 
60  *iteration_oss << "fuseRobots() -> ";
61 
62  ROS_DEBUG("Fusing Robots");
63 
64  state.robotsFused = true;
65 
66  for (uint p = 0; p < nParticles_; ++p)
67  {
68  std::vector<float> probabilities(nRobots_, 1.0);
69  std::vector<uint> landmarksUsed(nRobots_, 0);
70 
71  for (uint l = 0; l < nLandmarks_; ++l)
72  {
73  for (uint r = 0; r < nRobots_; ++r)
74  {
75  if (false == robotsUsed_[r] ||
76  false == bufLandmarkObservations_[r][l].found)
77  continue;
78 
79  uint o_robot = r * nStatesPerRobot_;
80 
81  LandmarkObservation& m = bufLandmarkObservations_[r][l];
82 
83  // Observation in robot frame
84  Eigen::Vector2f Zrobot(m.x, m.y);
85 
86  // Transformation to global frame
87  Eigen::Rotation2Df Rrobot(particles_[o_robot + O_THETA][p]);
88  Eigen::Vector2f Srobot(particles_[o_robot + O_X][p],
89  particles_[o_robot + O_Y][p]);
90  Eigen::Vector2f Zglobal = Srobot + Rrobot * Zrobot;
91 
92  // Error in observation
93  Eigen::Vector2f LM(landmarksMap_[l].x, landmarksMap_[l].y);
94 
95  // TODO should the Y frame be inverted?
96  Eigen::Vector2f Zglobal_err = LM - Zglobal;
97  Eigen::Vector2f Z_Zcap = Zrobot - Zglobal_err;
98 
99  ROS_DEBUG_COND(p == 0, "Error in seeing landmark %d = (%f , %f)", l,
100  Zglobal_err[O_X], Zglobal_err[O_Y]);
101  ROS_DEBUG_COND(p == 0,
102  "Landmark %d is at (%f , %f) and I see it at (%f, %f)",
103  l, LM[O_X], LM[O_Y], Zglobal[O_X], Zglobal[O_Y]);
104 
105  // The values of interest to the particle weights
106  // Note: using Eigen wasn't of particular interest here since it does
107  // not allow for transposing a non-dynamic matrix
108  float expArg = -0.5 * (Z_Zcap[0] * Z_Zcap[0] / m.covXX +
109  Z_Zcap[1] * Z_Zcap[1] / m.covYY);
110  float detValue = 1.0; // powf( (2*PI*Q[0][0]*Q[1][1]),-0.5);
111 
112  probabilities[r] *= detValue * exp(expArg);
113  landmarksUsed[r]++;
114  }
115  }
116 
117  // Update mean error vector
118  for (uint r = 0; r < nRobots_; ++r)
119  {
120  if (false == robotsUsed_[r])
121  continue;
122 
123  if (landmarksUsed[r] > 0)
124  weightComponents_[r][p] = probabilities[r];
125  }
126  }
127 
128  // Duplicate particles
129  particles_t dupParticles(particles_);
130 
131  for (uint r = 0; r < nRobots_; ++r)
132  {
133  if (false == robotsUsed_[r])
134  continue;
135 
136  uint o_robot = r * nStatesPerRobot_;
137 
138  // Create a vector of indexes according to a descending order of the weights
139  // components of robot r
140  std::vector<uint> sorted = order_index<pdata_t>(weightComponents_[r], DESC);
141 
142  // For every particle
143  for (uint p = 0; p < nParticles_; ++p)
144  {
145  // Re-order the particle subsets of this robot
146  uint sort_index = sorted[p];
147  particles_[o_robot + O_X][p] = dupParticles[o_robot + O_X][sort_index];
148  particles_[o_robot + O_Y][p] = dupParticles[o_robot + O_Y][sort_index];
149  particles_[o_robot + O_THETA][p] =
150  dupParticles[o_robot + O_THETA][sort_index];
151 
152  // Update the particle weight (will get multiplied nRobots times and get a
153  // lower value)
154  particles_[WEIGHT_INDEX][p] *= weightComponents_[r][sort_index];
155  }
156  }
157 
158  // Debugging
159  // for(uint p=0; p<nParticles_/5; ++p)
160  // ROS_DEBUG("pWeight[%d] = %f", p, particles_[WEIGHT_INDEX][p]);
161 
162  // Change state
163  state.robotsFused = true;
164 
165  // If the target measurements were performed prior to this function ending,
166  // then we should call the target fusion step here
167  if (!state.targetFused && state.allTargetMeasurementsDone())
168  fuseTarget();
169 }
170 
171 void ParticleFilter::fuseTarget()
172 {
173  if (!initialized_)
174  return;
175 
176  *iteration_oss << "fuseTarget() -> ";
177 
178  ROS_DEBUG("Fusing Target");
179 
180  state.targetFused = true;
181 
182  // If ball not seen by anyone, just skip all of this
183  bool ballSeen = false;
184  for (std::vector<TargetObservation>::iterator it =
185  bufTargetObservations_.begin();
186  it != bufTargetObservations_.end(); ++it)
187  ballSeen = ballSeen || it->found;
188 
189  if (!ballSeen)
190  goto exitFuseTarget;
191 
192  // If program is here, at least one robot saw the ball
193 
194  // For every particle m in the particle set [1:M]
195  for (uint m = 0; m < nParticles_; ++m)
196  {
197  // Keep track of the maximum contributed weight and that particle's index
198  float maxTargetSubParticleWeight = 0.0;
199  uint mStar = 0;
200 
201  // Find the particle m* in the set [m:M] for which the weight contribution
202  // by the target subparticle to the full weight is maximum
203  for (uint p = 0; p < nParticles_; ++p)
204  {
205  std::vector<float> probabilities(nRobots_, 1.0);
206 
207  // Observations of the target by all robots
208  for (uint r = 0; r < nRobots_; ++r)
209  {
210  if (false == robotsUsed_[r] || false == bufTargetObservations_[r].found)
211  continue;
212 
213  uint o_robot = r * nStatesPerRobot_;
214 
215  TargetObservation& obs = bufTargetObservations_[r];
216 
217  // Observation in robot frame
218  Eigen::Vector3f Zrobot(obs.x, obs.y, obs.z);
219 
220  // Transformation to global frame
221  // Affine creates a (Dim+1) * (Dim+1) matrix and sets
222  // last row to [0 0 ... 1]
223  Eigen::Transform<float, 2, Eigen::Affine> toGlobal(
224  Eigen::Rotation2Df(particles_[o_robot + O_THETA][m]));
225  Eigen::Vector3f Srobot(particles_[o_robot + O_X][m],
226  particles_[o_robot + O_Y][m], 0.0);
227  Eigen::Vector3f Zglobal = Srobot + toGlobal * Zrobot;
228 
229  // Error in observation
230  Eigen::Vector3f Target(particles_[O_TARGET + O_TX][p],
231  particles_[O_TARGET + O_TY][p],
232  particles_[O_TARGET + O_TZ][p]);
233 
234  // TODO should the Y frame be inverted?
235  Eigen::Vector3f Z_Zcap = Zrobot - (Target - Zglobal);
236 
237  // The values of interest to the particle weights
238  // Note: using Eigen wasn't of particular interest here since it does
239  // not allow for transposing a non-dynamic matrix
240 
241  // Q - diagonal matrix where the diagonal is ( covXX, covYY, 0.1 )
242  // Qinv - inverse of the diagonal matrix, consists of inverting each
243  // value in the diagonal
244 
245  float expArg = -0.5 * (Z_Zcap[0] * Z_Zcap[0] / obs.covXX +
246  Z_Zcap[1] * Z_Zcap[1] / obs.covYY +
247  Z_Zcap[2] * Z_Zcap[2] / 0.1);
248 
249  float detValue = 1.0;
250 
251  probabilities[r] *= detValue * exp(expArg);
252  }
253 
254  // Calculate total weight contributed by this particle
255  float totalWeight =
256  std::accumulate(probabilities.begin(), probabilities.end(), 0.0);
257 
258  // If the weight is the maximum as of now, update the maximum and set
259  // particle p as mStar
260  if (totalWeight > maxTargetSubParticleWeight)
261  {
262  // Swap particle m with m* so that the most relevant (in terms of
263  // weight)
264  // target subparticle is at the lowest indexes
265  maxTargetSubParticleWeight = totalWeight;
266  mStar = p;
267  }
268  }
269 
270  // Particle m* has been found, let's swap the subparticles
271  for (uint i = O_TX; i < O_TZ; ++i)
272  std::swap(particles_[O_TARGET + i][m], particles_[O_TARGET + i][mStar]);
273 
274  // Update the weight of this particle
275  particles_[WEIGHT_INDEX][m] *= maxTargetSubParticleWeight;
276  }
277 
278 // The target subparticles are now reordered according to their weight
279 // contribution
280 
281 exitFuseTarget:
282  // All that's missing is the resampling step
283  resample();
284 }
285 
286 void ParticleFilter::low_variance_resampler(const float weightSum)
287 {
288  // Low variance resampling exactly as implemented in the book Probabilistic
289  // robotics by thrun and burgard
290 
291  subparticles_t normalizedWeights(particles_[WEIGHT_INDEX]);
292  // Normalize the weights
293  for(uint i=0; i<nParticles_; ++i)
294  normalizedWeights[i] /= weightSum;
295 
296  // Duplicate the particle set
297  particles_t duplicate(particles_);
298 
299  // Generate a random number from a gaussian N~(0; 1/nParticles)
300  pdata_t MInv = 1.0 / nParticles_;
301  boost::random::normal_distribution<> genR(0.0, MInv);
302  pdata_t r = genR(seed_);
303 
304  // c is equal to the first particle's weight
305  pdata_t c = normalizedWeights[0];
306 
307  // Particle iterators
308  uint i = 0, m;
309 
310  // Iterate over the particle set
311  for (m = 0; m < nParticles_; ++m)
312  {
313  // Generate number from the random sample
314  pdata_t u = r + m * MInv;
315 
316  // Add weight until it reaches u
317  while (u > c)
318  c += normalizedWeights[++i];
319 
320  // Check if i is off limits
321  if (i >= nParticles_)
322  break;
323 
324  // Add this particle to the set
325  for (uint s = 0; s < nSubParticleSets_; ++s)
326  particles_[s][m] = duplicate[s][i];
327  }
328 
329  ROS_DEBUG("End of low_variance_resampler()");
330 
331  ROS_ERROR_COND(m != nParticles_, "The variance resampler didn't add the "
332  "required number of particles, from %d to "
333  "%d the set was left unchanged!",
334  m, nParticles_ - 1);
335 }
336 
337 void ParticleFilter::myResampler(const float weightSum)
338 {
339  // Implementing a very basic resampler... a particle gets selected
340  // proportional to its weight and 50% of the top particles are kept
341 
342  subparticles_t normalizedWeights(particles_[WEIGHT_INDEX]);
343  // Normalize the weights
344  for(uint i=0; i<nParticles_; ++i)
345  normalizedWeights[i] /= weightSum;
346 
347  particles_t duplicate(particles_);
348 
349  std::vector<pdata_t> cumulativeWeights(nParticles_);
350  cumulativeWeights[0] = normalizedWeights[0];
351 
352  for (int par = 1; par < nParticles_; par++)
353  {
354  cumulativeWeights[par] =
355  cumulativeWeights[par - 1] + normalizedWeights[par];
356  }
357 
358  for (int par = 0; par < nParticles_ * 0.5; par++)
359  {
360  for (int k = 0; k < nSubParticleSets_; k++)
361  {
362  particles_[k][par] = duplicate[k][par];
363  }
364  }
365 
366  for (int par = nParticles_ * 0.5; par < nParticles_; par++)
367  {
368  boost::random::uniform_real_distribution<> dist(0, 1);
369  float randNo = dist(seed_);
370 
371  int m = 0;
372  while (randNo > cumulativeWeights[m])
373  m++;
374 
375  for (int k = 0; k < nSubParticleSets_; k++)
376  particles_[k][par] = duplicate[k][m];
377  }
378 
379  ROS_DEBUG("End of myResampler()");
380 }
381 
382 void ParticleFilter::resample()
383 {
384  if (!initialized_)
385  return;
386 
387  state.resampled = true;
388 
389  *iteration_oss << "resample() -> ";
390  ROS_DEBUG("Resampling");
391 
392  for (uint r = 0; r < nRobots_; ++r)
393  {
394  uint o_robot = r * nStatesPerRobot_;
395 
396  float stdX = pfuclt_aux::calc_stdDev<pdata_t>(particles_[o_robot + O_X]);
397  float stdY = pfuclt_aux::calc_stdDev<pdata_t>(particles_[o_robot + O_Y]);
398  float stdTheta =
399  pfuclt_aux::calc_stdDev<pdata_t>(particles_[o_robot + O_THETA]);
400 
401  state.robots[r].conf = stdX + stdY + stdTheta;
402  }
403 
404  // Calc. sum of weights
405  float weightSum = std::accumulate(particles_[WEIGHT_INDEX].begin(),
406  particles_[WEIGHT_INDEX].end(), 0.0);
407 
408  ROS_DEBUG("WeightSum of Particles = %f", weightSum);
409 
410  if (weightSum == 0.0)
411  {
412  ROS_ERROR("Zero weightsum - returning and resetting weights");
413 
414  resetWeights();
415 
416  // Print iteration and state information
417  *iteration_oss << "DONE!";
418  ROS_DEBUG("Iteration: %s", iteration_oss->str().c_str());
419 
420  state.print();
421 
422  // Clear ostringstream
423  iteration_oss->str("");
424  iteration_oss->clear();
425 
426  // Start next iteration
427  state.reset();
428 
429  // Exit
430  return;
431  }
432 
433  printWeights("Before resampling: ");
434 
435  low_variance_resampler(weightSum);
436  // myResampler(weightSum);
437 
438  printWeights("After resampling: ");
439 
440  // Resampling done, find the current state belief
441  weightSum = std::accumulate(particles_[WEIGHT_INDEX].begin(),
442  particles_[WEIGHT_INDEX].end(), 0.0);
443 
444  ROS_DEBUG("WeightSum after resampling = %f", weightSum);
445 
446  // A vector of weighted means that will be calculated in the following nested
447  // loops
448  std::vector<double> weightedMeans(nStatesPerRobot_, 1.0);
449 
450  // Target weighted means
451  std::vector<double> targetWeightedMeans(STATES_PER_TARGET, 1.0);
452 
456 
457  // For each robot
458  for (uint r = 0; r < nRobots_; ++r)
459  {
460  uint o_robot = r * nStatesPerRobot_;
461 
462  // ..and each particle
463  for (uint p = 0; p < nParticles_; ++p)
464  {
465  // Accumulate the state proportionally to the particle's weight
466  for (uint g = 0; g < nStatesPerRobot_; ++g)
467  {
468  weightedMeans[g] +=
469  particles_[o_robot + g][p] * particles_[WEIGHT_INDEX][p];
470  }
471 
472  for (uint t = 0; t < STATES_PER_TARGET; ++t)
473  {
474  targetWeightedMeans[t] +=
475  particles_[O_TARGET + t][p] * particles_[WEIGHT_INDEX][p];
476  }
477  }
478 
479  // Normalize the means
480  for (uint g = 0; g < nStatesPerRobot_; ++g)
481  weightedMeans[g] /= weightSum;
482 
483  for (uint t = 0; t < STATES_PER_TARGET; ++t)
484  weightedMeans[t] /= weightSum;
485 
486  // Save in the robot state
487  state.robots[r].x = weightedMeans[O_X];
488  state.robots[r].y = weightedMeans[O_Y];
489  state.robots[r].theta = weightedMeans[O_THETA];
490 
491  // Save in the target state
492  // First the velocity, then the position
493  state.target.vx =
494  (state.target.x - targetWeightedMeans[O_TX]) / iterationTime;
495  state.target.x = targetWeightedMeans[O_TX];
496  state.target.vy =
497  state.target.y - targetWeightedMeans[O_TY] / iterationTime;
498  state.target.y = targetWeightedMeans[O_TY];
499  state.target.vz =
500  state.target.z - targetWeightedMeans[O_TZ] / iterationTime;
501  state.target.z = targetWeightedMeans[O_TZ];
502  }
503 
504  // Print iteration and state information
505  *iteration_oss << "DONE!";
506  ROS_DEBUG("Iteration: %s", iteration_oss->str().c_str());
507 
508  state.print();
509 
510  // Clear ostringstream
511  iteration_oss->str("");
512  iteration_oss->clear();
513 
514  // Start next iteration
515  state.reset();
516 }
517 
518 void ParticleFilter::printWeights(std::string pre)
519 {
520  std::ostringstream debug;
521  debug << pre;
522  for (uint i = 0; i < nParticles_; ++i)
523  debug << particles_[WEIGHT_INDEX][i] << " ";
524 
525  ROS_DEBUG("%s", debug.str().c_str());
526 }
527 
528 void ParticleFilter::assign(const pdata_t value)
529 {
530  for (int i = 0; i < nSubParticleSets_; ++i)
531  assign(value, i);
532 }
533 
534 void ParticleFilter::assign(const pdata_t value, const uint index)
535 {
536  particles_[index].assign(nParticles_, value);
537 }
538 
539 ParticleFilter::ParticleFilter(const uint nParticles, const uint nTargets,
540  const uint statesPerRobot, const uint nRobots,
541  const uint nLandmarks,
542  const std::vector<bool>& robotsUsed,
543  const std::vector<Landmark>& landmarksMap,
544  const std::vector<float> alpha)
545  : nParticles_(nParticles), nTargets_(nTargets),
546  nStatesPerRobot_(statesPerRobot), nRobots_(nRobots),
547  nSubParticleSets_(nTargets * STATES_PER_TARGET +
548  nRobots * statesPerRobot + 1),
549  nLandmarks_(nLandmarks), iteration_oss(new std::ostringstream("")),
550  particles_(nSubParticleSets_, subparticles_t(nParticles)), seed_(time(0)),
551  initialized_(false), alpha_(alpha),
552  bufLandmarkObservations_(nRobots,
553  std::vector<LandmarkObservation>(nLandmarks)),
554  bufTargetObservations_(nRobots), prevTime(ROS_TIME_SEC),
555  robotsUsed_(robotsUsed), landmarksMap_(landmarksMap),
556  weightComponents_(nRobots, subparticles_t(nParticles, 0.0)),
557  state(nRobots, robotsUsed)
558 {
559 
560  // If vector alpha is not provided, use a default one
561  if (alpha_.empty())
562  {
563  for (int r = 0; r < nRobots; ++r)
564  {
565  alpha_.push_back(0.015);
566  alpha_.push_back(0.1);
567  alpha_.push_back(0.5);
568  alpha_.push_back(0.001);
569  }
570  }
571 
572  // Check size of vector alpha
573  if (alpha_.size() != 4 * nRobots)
574  {
575  ROS_ERROR("The provided vector alpha is not of the correct size. Returning "
576  "without particle filter! (should have %d=nRobots*4 elements)",
577  nRobots * 4);
578  return;
579  }
580 
581  ROS_INFO("Created particle filter with dimensions %d, %d",
582  (int)particles_.size(), (int)particles_[0].size());
583 }
584 
585 // TODO set different values for position and orientation, targets, etc
586 // Simple version, use default values - randomize all values between [-10,10]
587 void ParticleFilter::init()
588 {
589  if (initialized_)
590  return;
591 
592  int lvalue = -10;
593  int rvalue = 10;
594 
595  std::vector<double> def((nSubParticleSets_ - 1) * 2);
596 
597  for (int i = 0; i < def.size(); i += 2)
598  {
599  def[i] = lvalue;
600  def[i + 1] = rvalue;
601  }
602 
603  // Call the custom function with these values
604  init(def);
605 }
606 
607 // Overloaded function when using custom values
608 void ParticleFilter::init(const std::vector<double> custom)
609 {
610  if (initialized_)
611  return;
612 
613  // Set flag
614  initialized_ = true;
615 
616  ROS_INFO("Initializing particle filter");
617 
618  ROS_DEBUG_COND(custom.size() != ((nSubParticleSets_ - 1) * 2),
619  "The provided vector for initilization does not have the "
620  "correct size (should have %d elements",
621  (nSubParticleSets_ - 1) * 2);
622 
623  // For all subparticle sets except the particle weights
624  for (int i = 0; i < custom.size() / 2; ++i)
625  {
626  ROS_DEBUG("Values for distribution: %.4f %.4f", custom[2 * i],
627  custom[2 * i + 1]);
628 
629  boost::random::uniform_real_distribution<> dist(custom[2 * i],
630  custom[2 * i + 1]);
631 
632  // Sample a value from the uniform distribution for each particle
633  BOOST_FOREACH (pdata_t& val, particles_[i])
634  {
635  val = dist(seed_);
636  }
637  }
638 
639  // Particle weights init with same weight (1/nParticles)
640  resetWeights();
641 
642  // Reset PF state
643  state.reset();
644 
645  ROS_INFO("Particle filter initialized");
646 
647  // Record the time
648  prevTime = ROS_TIME_SEC;
649 }
650 
651 void ParticleFilter::predict(const uint robotNumber, const Odometry odom)
652 {
653  if (!initialized_)
654  return;
655 
656  // Change predicted state
657  state.predicted[robotNumber] = true;
658 
659  *iteration_oss << "predict(OMNI" << robotNumber + 1 << ") -> ";
660 
661  using namespace boost::random;
662 
663  ROS_DEBUG("Predicting for OMNI%d", robotNumber + 1);
664 
665  // Variables concerning this robot specifically
666  int robot_offset = robotNumber * nStatesPerRobot_;
667  float alpha[4] = { alpha_[robotNumber * 4], alpha_[robotNumber * 4 + 1],
668  alpha_[robotNumber * 4 + 2], alpha_[robotNumber * 4 + 3] };
669 
670  // TODO find out if this model is correct
671  // Determining the propagation of the robot state through odometry
672  float deltaRot = atan2(odom.y, odom.x) - odom.theta;
673  float deltaTrans = sqrt(odom.x * odom.x + odom.y * odom.y);
674  float deltaFinalRot = odom.theta - deltaRot;
675 
676  // Create an error model based on a gaussian distribution
677  normal_distribution<> deltaRotEffective(deltaRot, alpha[0] * fabs(deltaRot) +
678  alpha[1] * deltaTrans);
679  normal_distribution<> deltaTransEffective(
680  deltaTrans,
681  alpha[2] * deltaTrans + alpha[3] * fabs(deltaRot + deltaFinalRot));
682  normal_distribution<> deltaFinalRotEffective(
683  deltaFinalRot, alpha[0] * fabs(deltaFinalRot) + alpha[1] * deltaTrans);
684 
685  // Debugging
686  ROS_DEBUG("Before prediction: p[%d] = [%f %f %f]", nParticles_ / 2,
687  particles_[O_X + robot_offset][nParticles_ / 2],
688  particles_[O_Y + robot_offset][nParticles_ / 2],
689  particles_[O_THETA + robot_offset][nParticles_ / 2]);
690  ROS_DEBUG("Odometry = [%f %f %f]", odom.x, odom.y, odom.theta);
691 
692  for (int i = 0; i < nParticles_; i++)
693  {
694  // Rotate to final position
695  particles_[O_THETA + robot_offset][i] += deltaRotEffective(seed_);
696 
697  // Translate to final position
698  particles_[O_X + robot_offset][i] +=
699  deltaTransEffective(seed_) * cos(particles_[O_THETA + robot_offset][i]);
700  particles_[O_Y + robot_offset][i] +=
701  deltaTransEffective(seed_) * sin(particles_[O_THETA + robot_offset][i]);
702 
703  // Rotate to final position and normalize angle
704  particles_[O_THETA + robot_offset][i] = angles::normalize_angle(
705  particles_[O_THETA + robot_offset][i] + deltaFinalRotEffective(seed_));
706  }
707 
708  // Debugging
709  ROS_DEBUG("After prediction: p[%d] = [%f %f %f]", nParticles_ / 2,
710  particles_[O_X + robot_offset][nParticles_ / 2],
711  particles_[O_Y + robot_offset][nParticles_ / 2],
712  particles_[O_THETA + robot_offset][nParticles_ / 2]);
713 
714  // If all robots have predicted, also predict the target state
715  if (state.allPredicted() && !state.targetPredicted)
716  predictTarget(robotNumber);
717 
718  // Start fusing if all robots have done their measurements and predictions
719  if (!state.robotsFused && state.allLandmarkMeasurementsDone() &&
720  state.allPredicted())
721  fuseRobots();
722 }
723 
724 void ParticleFilter::saveAllLandmarkMeasurementsDone(const uint robotNumber)
725 {
726  if (!initialized_)
727  return;
728 
729  *iteration_oss << "allLandmarks(OMNI" << robotNumber + 1 << ") -> ";
730 
731  // Change state
732  state.landmarkMeasurementsDone[robotNumber] = true;
733 
734  // Start fusing if all robots have done their measurements and predictions
735  if (!state.robotsFused && state.allLandmarkMeasurementsDone() &&
736  state.allPredicted())
737  fuseRobots();
738 }
739 
740 void ParticleFilter::saveAllTargetMeasurementsDone(const uint robotNumber)
741 {
742  if (!initialized_)
743  return;
744 
745  // Change state
746  state.targetMeasurementsDone[robotNumber] = true;
747 
748  *iteration_oss << "allTargets(OMNI" << robotNumber + 1 << ") -> ";
749 
750  // Start fusing if all robots have done their target measurements and the
751  // robot fusion step has been performed
752  if (!state.targetFused && state.robotsFused &&
753  state.allTargetMeasurementsDone())
754  fuseTarget();
755 }
756 
757 // end of namespace pfuclt_ptcls
758 }
